customHeadContent:
<style>
  div[data-element-type='content'] a {
      color: blue;
  }    
  .confirmation {
    background-color: rgb(235, 230, 230);
    padding: 5px;    
  }
</style>
description: Bambora Request to freeze a Membership
name: Bambora Membership Freeze

events.name: Get Member
Clear Member Details

elements.name: Primary Family Member
elements.visible: !form('review') && values('Members')!==null && bundle.isPrimaryBiller() && (values('Billing Customer Reference')!=="" || values('Billing Customer Reference')!==null)  && (typeof(loadingDetails) !== "undefined" && !loadingDetails)

elements.name: Primary Family Member Info
elements.text:
Primary Family Member

The member selected $studentName$ is the Primary family member.
Completing this form will also Freeze all Family members.
If you only wish to Freeze this member and NOT the dependant members, please follow below.
  • Click here to complete Bambora Setup Biller Details(Family) form to remove dependant members from billing.
  • Set the students status to Frozen, after completing the above form.

elements.name: Family Dependant Member
elements.visible: !form('review') && values('Members')!==null && values('Non Paying')!=="YES" && (values('Billing Parent Member')!=="" && values('Billing Parent Member')!==null && values('Billing Parent Member')!==values('Members'))  && (values('Billing Customer Reference')==="" || values('Billing Customer Reference')===null)  && (typeof(loadingDetails) !== "undefined" && !loadingDetails)

elements.name: Family Dependant Info
elements.text:
Family Dependant Member

The member selected $studentName$ is a depend family member.
  • Complete the Bambora Setup Biller Details(Family) form to remove the student from billing.
    • Click here to complete form.
  • Set the students status to Frozen, after completing the above form.

elements.name: Non Paying Info
elements.text:
Non Paying Member

The member selected $studentName$ is a Non Paying member.
  • Set the students status to Frozen directly on the Members record.
  • Click here to change status

elements.name: Cash Member Info
elements.text:
Cash Member

The member selected $studentName$ is a Cash Paying member.
  • Set the students status to Frozen directly on the Members record.
  • Click here to change status

elements.name: Non Billing
elements.visible: !form('review') && values('Members')!==null && values('Non Paying')!=="YES" && ( values('Billing User')===undefined || values('Billing User')===null || values('Billing User')==="") && (values('Billing Parent Member')===null || values('Billing Parent Member')===undefined || values('Billing Parent Member')==="") && (typeof(loadingDetails) !== "undefined" && !loadingDetails)

elements.name: Non Billing Info
elements.text:
Non Billing Member

The member selected $studentName$ is a Non billing or Cash member.
  • Set the students status to Frozen directly on the Members record.
  • Click here to change status

elements.name: Freeze Information
elements.visible: values('Members')!==null && (values('Billing Customer Reference')!=="" && values('Billing Customer Reference')!==null) && ((typeof(loadingDetails) !== "undefined" && !loadingDetails) || form('review'))

elements.name: Date of Last Payment HMTL
Date Payments Resume HTML

events.name: Must be later
events.code: alert('Please ensure that the Resume date is after the Freeze Date');
events.runIf: moment(values('Date Payments Resume')). isSameOrBefore(moment(values('Date of Last Payment')))

events.name: Set Value

elements.name: List of Documents
elements.title: List of Documents
elements.visible: values('Members')!==null && (values('Billing Customer Reference')!=="" && values('Billing Customer Reference')!==null) && ((typeof(loadingDetails) !== "undefined" && !loadingDetails) || form('review'))

elements.name: Document Information
elements.text: Please provide the list of documents you are submitting to prove the reason for your membership freeze request.

elements.name: Terms Information
elements.text:
The student's installment payments must be current and up to date prior to submitting the application.

Thirty (30) days written notice must be given at the school, and the minimum freeze period is thirty (30) days.

Your request will be evaluated and you will be contacted within 3 business days.

elements.name: Confirmation Info
elements.text:
Please confirm that you wish to freeze _MemberName_.
Starting _StartingDate_.
Resuming _ResumeDate_.
With a freeze fee of $_FreezeFee_.

elements.label: Continue
elements.name: Continue
elements.enabled: values('Members')!==null && (values('Billing Customer Reference')!=="" && values('Billing Customer Reference')!==null)

events.name: Confirmation Submission
Load Signatures
Load Members Select
Handle Errors
Set Defaults
